location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Civil Auditor, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledges the receipt of John Wedderburn's letter of 16 November 1819, which included an audit on disbursements for June to August 1819 with a request for explanations. Bruce encloses the audit (not included) with the requested explanations.
